summary.title: Personal Profile
summary.text: I'm a versatile software developer, trainer and storyteller. I recently completed a remote Full-Stack Development Diploma with Code Institute (Dublin). I have extensive experience in localization, translation, and technical writing, with a proven ability to handle complex challenges in varied specialist environments. I'm eager to rejoin an innovative and capable development team.

workRelevantSkills.languagesText: English as mother tongue, totally fluent in German (C1 certification) and Spanish. I lived for 9 years in Spain, and for the last 23 years in Berlin). I have a reader's knowledge of French, Italian and Irish
workRelevantSkills.mgtText: Project management, agile methodologies, strategic planning
workRelevantSkills.xlationText: From Spanish and German into English. Specialized in IT, public transport & telecommunication, but also worked extensively with sociological and historical texts
workRelevantSkills.docuText: Release notes, help and training materials, document integration for agile development, training and help, multi-lingual documentation, automated file and resource manipulation
workRelevantSkills.hobbiesText: I’m an experienced gardener and a beekeeper. I enjoy making silicon moulds for epoxy resin components.
